# Agile (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
A character with [[Weapon Finesse (Feat)|Weapon Finesse]] can apply her Dexterity modifier to damage rolls with an *agile* weapon in place of her Strength modifier. This modifier to damage is not increased for two-handed weapons, but is still reduced for off-hand weapons. This weapon special ability can be placed only on melee weapons usable with [[Weapon Finesse (Feat)|Weapon Finesse]]..

Moderate transmutation; CL 7th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|cat's grace]]*; Price +1 bonus. 

**Source:** Hell's Rebels AP 4 A Song of Silver, pg. 21
